text: 26:63 Aisaia 53:7; Matyu 27:12Ezɨ Iesus nɨmɨra ikia mɨgɨrɨgɨatam gamir puvatɨ. Ezɨ ofa gamir gumazibar dapanim a mɨgɨa ghaze, “Kɨ akar gavgavim nɨ ganɨdi, nɨ Godɨn zurara itimɨn ziamɨn akakagh, egh guizbangɨra e mɨkɨm. Nɨ ti, God Uam E Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim, nɨ ti Godɨn Otarimra, o puvatɨ?”
